data.actual_result: It never goes below 50% ~ (on a Intel Celeron N3350)
data.expected_result: The CPU usage shouldn't become crazy
data.short_description: The Wumpus animation (+ moving background) on the Discord Nitro payment and redeem code dialogs uses A LOT of CPU
data.steps_to_repro: - Open Discord (Stable, PTB or Canary) on web or desktop - Look at the CPU usage - Go in your User Settings - Either go to the payment dialog or redeem code dialog - Look once again at the CPU usage
